issue.title: Hide tooltip when `ComboBox` menu is open

labels.name: ðŸ˜¤ annoying
labels.description: Something in the UI / SDK is annoying to use

repository.name: rerun
repository.description: Visualize streams of multimodal data. Free, fast, easy to use, and simple to integrate. Built in Rust.

issue.body:
* Very similar to https://github.com/rerun-io/rerun/issues/5310
* egui issue: https://github.com/emilk/egui/issues/4338

If you set a tooltip for a `ComboBox`, that should be hidden as soon as the user opens the `ComboBox` dropdown, or the tooltip will cover the dropdown.

issue.title: Add tooltip to the timeline selection

repository.name: rerun
repository.description: Visualize streams of multimodal data. Free, fast, easy to use, and simple to integrate. Built in Rust.

issue.body:
Adding a onHover message for the timeline selection that says what a timeline is and that you can change it would be very helpful for onboarding.

![Screenshot 2024-04-08 at 10 19 58](https://github.com/rerun-io/rerun/assets/2624717/b9fcae78-e51b-48cf-8742-ba9643e4ddd1)

issue.title: Add tooltip to timeline selector

issue.body:
### What
* Closes https://github.com/rerun-io/rerun/issues/5836
* Blocked by https://github.com/emilk/egui/issues/4338

### Checklist
* [x] I have read and agree to [Contributor Guide](https://github.com/rerun-io/rerun/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) and the [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/rerun-io/rerun/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

* [x] I have tested the web demo (if applicable):
  * Using newly built examples: [rerun.io/viewer](https://rerun.io/viewer/pr/5842)

  * Using full set of examples from `nightly` build: [rerun.io/viewer](https://rerun.io/viewer/pr/5842?manifest_url=https://app.rerun.io/version/nightly/examples_manifest.json)
* [x] The PR title and labels are set such as to maximize their usefulness for the next release's CHANGELOG
* [x] If applicable, add a new check to the [release checklist](https://github.com/rerun-io/rerun/blob/main/tests/python/release_checklist)!
